queries.sql: SELECT sum(valor_total_producto) as total_devoluciones FROM detalle_devolucion_venta WHERE fecha_y_hora_venta BETWEEN '2023-12-28 16:09:37.3513' AND '2023-12-29 14:38:54.5655';
